data.title: Welcome to Assam Industrial Development Corporation
data.text:
Name of the Infrastructure : Industrial Growth Centre, Matia Location / Address : Mornai, Revenue Circle – Matia, P.O. & P.S. – Mornai, Dist. – Goalpara, Assam-783101 Accessibility : Air: 115 km from LGB International Airport, Borjhar, Guwahati.

Rail: 15km from Goalpara Town Railway station.

Road: 130 km distance from Guwahati City. Excellent road link with entire North Eastern states and rest of the country. Approach Road : Zero Km from State Highway-46 and 15 Km from National Highway-37. GPS Coordinates : 26°05'43"N,90°44'21"E Total Project Cost : Rs.2200.00 Lakhs (1 st Phase) Project Status : 1 stphase completed in the year 2006. Total Land : 1672 Bigha (553 Acres) Industrial Unit Details :

The following industries had already been allotted the land at Industrial Growth Centre, Matia:

In-principleapprovals have been issued to following industries for allotment of land at Industrial Growth Centre, Matia:

Infrastructure Facilities available : Internal roads with drainage system, Power supply system with street lighting, 132/33 KV substation for dedicated power line, Water supply network with overhead reservoir, Canteen facilities, Security facilities, Bank & ATM facilities, Market complex, Administrative Building cum Guest house facilities, etc.
